channel.title: How do I change the IP for my client
channel.description: Hey I forgot how to change the IP on a 517 client... I was going to host it but i can't change the ip to my ip.. :confused:

item.title: How do I change the IP for my client
item.dc:creator: @gamerscape gamerscape
item.description:
@gamerscape wrote:

go to your client and go to EGUI.JAVA OR GUI.JAVA (there both the same)

and it will be like this

System.out.println(“Connecting”);
Serverip = “0.0.0.0”;
sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

change the 0.0.0.0 to your ip address

thats how my client set out hope it helps

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the IP for my client
